channel.title: 718 Dynamix RsPs
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/4udge8.jpg[/img] [CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=3]Note: Server Is Still Under construction[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Home: http://"http://www.thedynamix.org/ PLay now: https://rapidshare.com/#!download|958p1|723560937|Dynamix%20DL%20Client.jar|3119|0|0
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2cxw32h.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [SIZE=2][COLOR="#000000"]Welcome to Dynamix![/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="#696969"]Dynamix is a 718 RuneScape Private Server dedicated to you, the players. We strive each and every day to please our player base by adding quality updates into our server. We love feed back good or bad. It let's us know what you do or don't like and will greatly effect the future updates and longevity of the server. Playing is simple we have two button, 'Play' for the webclient and 'Download' for the downloadable version of the client. All of our staff is dedicated towards helping you so if you have any questions feel free to send us a private message or just ask in the shout box. The best way to contact me is either private messaging on here, messaging me on facebook [url=http://www.facebook.com/DynamixRSPS]www.facebook.com/DynamixRSPS[/url] or tweeting me @DynamixRSPS [/COLOR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24guoh0.jpg[/img] -Wilderness- -All Wildernes pvp combat is working -Once killed a player you will recieve 100 Pvp Tokens, but in this case its called Archery Tickets which will be used as the pvp currency, this will be used on the Pk shop. You will also lose all your items if you were to die, and all the items you loose the winner will be able to claim. you cannot be part of staff and contribute to pvp, considering the face that you will not loose your items and you will not drop anything. - Players - -Custome Teleports- -All Skils Working -Spell book has now basic teleports, and will be used as a main teleport method.... no runes or level required. -Starter Pack- -New starter pack has been initialized. -New Shops for donators have been putin the game, but normal players cannot see the actual shops. -Slayer- -Slayer master has now been fixed. He will finally give all slayer task of all npcs in the game that are spawned atm..... next, the slayer xp is given by slayer npc hp, npc xp = npchp / 2 -New teleports added -Sling animation has been fixed but i dont know about the xp,,, -pest control is working -new command format -money pouch works. -black partyhat added -nex drops where edited but not spawned -stairs have been updated in some places, no all, trying to actually recode the entire system because al stairs only either teleport you one z coord up or down which is bad for some cases...... -thieving stalls working now -thieving npcs work(bug isnt valid) [CENTER][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/kdkifm.jpg[/img][/CENTER][COLOR="#00FFFF"]Co-owner-Coder-[/COLOR][COLOR="#FF0000"]Garbon[/COLOR] [COLOR="#DAA520"]Owner-[/COLOR][COLOR="#FF0000"]Tyler[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/nzftld.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2818yki.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5n9ap1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/177lna.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1182i4j.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/15n37ef.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1gj1ut.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/292bqzo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/as393.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/21ce05h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2q0q1pf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9sz53p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/302vpdh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/256bo8g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/148rcy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24wt060.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11cblz9.jpg[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: 718 Dynamix RsPs
item.dc:creator: @StrikeX StrikeX
item.description:
@StrikeX wrote:

[CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=3]Note: Server Is Still Under construction[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Home: http://"http://www.thedynamix.org/
PLay now: https://rapidshare.com/#!download|958p1|723560937|Dynamix%20DL%20Client.jar|3119|0|0

[/CENTER]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#000000"]Welcome to Dynamix![/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="#696969"]Dynamix is a 718 RuneScape Private Server dedicated to you, the players. We strive each and every day to please our player base by adding quality updates into our server. We love feed back good or bad. It let’s us know what you do or don’t like and will greatly effect the future updates and longevity of the server. Playing is simple we have two button, ‘Play’ for the webclient and ‘Download’ for the downloadable version of the client. All of our staff is dedicated towards helping you so if you have any questions feel free to send us a private message or just ask in the shout box. The best way to contact me is either private messaging on here, messaging me on facebook www.facebook.com/DynamixRSPS or tweeting me @DynamixRSPS [/COLOR]

[CENTER]
-Wilderness-
-All Wildernes pvp combat is working
-Once killed a player you will recieve 100 Pvp Tokens, but in this case its called Archery Tickets which will be used as the pvp currency, this will be used on the Pk shop. You will also lose all your items if you were to die, and all the items you loose the winner will be able to claim. you cannot be part of staff and contribute to pvp, considering the face that you will not loose your items and you will not drop anything.

  • Players -
    -Custome Teleports-
    -All Skils Working
    -Spell book has now basic teleports, and will be used as a main teleport method… no runes or level required.
    -Starter Pack-
    -New starter pack has been initialized.
    -New Shops for donators have been putin the game, but normal players cannot see the actual shops.
    -Slayer-
    -Slayer master has now been fixed. He will finally give all slayer task of all npcs in the game that are spawned atm… next, the slayer xp is given by slayer npc hp, npc xp = npchp / 2
    -New teleports added
    -Sling animation has been fixed but i dont know about the xp,
    -pest control is working
    -new command format
    -money pouch works.
    -black partyhat added
    -nex drops where edited but not spawned
    -stairs have been updated in some places, no all, trying to actually recode the entire system because al stairs only either teleport you one z coord up or down which is bad for some cases…
    -thieving stalls working now
    -thieving npcs work(bug isnt valid)
    [CENTER][/CENTER][COLOR="#00FFFF"]Co-owner-Coder-[/COLOR][COLOR="#FF0000"]Garbon[/COLOR]
    [COLOR="#DAA520"]Owner-[/COLOR][COLOR="#FF0000"]Tyler[/COLOR]

















[/CENTER]
